name: Bionic Hand
Lore: 'Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on a Disarmed character. Cancels the disarming card. Character is power +1 and adds 1 to weapon destiny when firing character weapons. Device lost if character Disarmed again (otherwise, may not be removed).',
